pr_title: Convert the bb lti flow to a generic lti flow.

timeline.message: Blackboard LTI to Generic LTI. Update in the GenericLtiWrapperExtension to allow custom parameters for userid and username
Generic LTI. Allow custom LTI attributes for userId and userName
Generic LTI: Labels and Editor improvements. UserName instead UserLoginId
Blackboard LTI to Generic LTI. Ignore the custom parameters in Canvas and D2L
Blackboard LTI to Generic LTI. Style improvements.

timeline.bodyText: Being a new file, this is no longer needed. As we don't run the tooling to check for non-localised strings any more.
timeline.author: edalex-ian

replies.bodyText: I like the idea to extract the duplicated code.  Thanks for the proposed code, it works fine.
replies.author: ddelblanco

timeline.author: edalex-ian

timeline.message: Blackboard LTI to Generic LTI. Style improvements in GenericLTIWrapperExtension. Remove nls tes

timeline.bodyText: I would pass the actual LtiConsumer object instead of param.  The GenericLtiWrapperExtension can pull out its specific param, and custom wrappers like Canvas can do what it likes to get its own custom parameters out of the LtiConsumer
timeline.author: abidingotter
abidingotter

timeline.bodyText: I would change String param to LtiConsumer consumer
timeline.author: abidingotter

timeline.message: bb-lti:  generalized user id prefix, revisions due to PR

timeline.bodyText: You're right, we can probably delete it (and the reference to it in the plugin.xml)
timeline.author: abidingotter

replies.bodyText: Since I'm not 100% sure the use case for LisLtiWrapperExtension, and I plan to backport this to 2019.1.3 so I don't want to remove functionality, I'm going to hold off for this effort.  I opened #1435 so there's visibility for future work
replies.author: cbeach47

timeline.author: abidingotter

timeline.message: bb-lti:  rename to align with generic LTI
